remarks: Bidirectional conversion between an implicit class substitution hypothesis ` x = A -> B = C ` and its explicit substitution equivalent. (Contributed by NM, 2-Mar-2008.)
statement:
csbieb.1 $e |- A e. _V $.
csbieb.2 $e |- F/_ x C $.
csbieb $p |- ( A. x ( x = A -> B = C ) <-> [_ A / x ]_ B = C ) $.
$d A x $.
